title: ATuner
summary: ATuner - A Guitar Tuner for Android Wear and Android phones.
description: A tuner developed for Android Wear.Tune your instrument using the micro of your smartwatch wherever you are.-   It supports both English (A, B, C...) and Latin (La, Si, Do...) notation.    To change its notation just tap the grey rounded area.-   Change between flat and sharp note by hold touching the grey rounded area.Also available for Android Phone!Internet permission is only used in the mobile version for showing ads.
descriptionHTML:
A tuner developed for Android Wear.

Tune your instrument using the micro of your smartwatch wherever you are.

- It supports both English (A, B, C...) and Latin (La, Si, Do...) notation.
To change its notation just tap the grey rounded area.

- Change between flat and sharp note by hold touching the grey rounded area.

Also available for Android Phone!

Internet permission is only used in the mobile version for showing ads.
